This project is the Cambridge Research UK Cambridge Institute (CRUK-CI) Java client for Clarity's REST API.

To use the client, create a Spring application context including the file org/cruk/clarity/api/clarity-client-context.xml, from which you can obtain the bean "clarityAPI". If you wish to use the caching facility, also add the file org/cruk/clarity/api/clarity-cache-context.xml to the application context path.

@author Richard Bowers (richard.bowers@cruk.cam.ac.uk) @see EhCache
